N = int(input())

count = 0
for i in range(1, N+1):
    count += len(str(i)) % 2

print(count)

N = int(input())

odd_count = 0

for i in range(1, N + 1):
    if len(str(i)) % 2 == 1:
        odd_count += 1

print(odd_count)

        odd_count += 1
